# Slide design guidelines

.font120[
- Use handouts
- Use a light-colored background (tan / gray)
- Slide titles: A single statement about what slide means
- Slide numbers: bottom-left or bottom-right
- Remove “chart junk”: logos, footers, etc. (exception: ©)
- Use large font sizes (>40 titles, >24 text)
- San-serif fonts for all text (italic serif for quotes)
]]
